# minimale R Shiny App

library(shiny)
library(leaflet)

# UI
ui <- fluidPage(
  navbarPage(
    title = "Leaflet App",
    tabPanel(
      "Karte",
      leafletOutput("map")
    )
  ),
  absolutePanel(
    top = 60, right = 10,
    width = 300, height = "auto",
    sliderInput("slider", "Slider", min = 1, max = 100, value = 50),
    selectInput("dropdown", "Dropdown", choices = c("Option 1", "Option 2", "Option 3"))
  )
)

# Server
server <- function(input, output, session) {
  
  output$map <- renderLeaflet({
    leaflet() %>%
      addTiles() %>%
      setView(lng = 8.8, lat = 51.7, zoom = 10)
  })
  
}

# Run the application
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
